New Records: Anthony Edwards set a new career high with 53 points in the Timberwolves loss to the Pistons.
Key Match Events: Detroit guard Cade Cunningham scored a season-high 40 points, surpassing his previous season high of 35 points against Milwaukee on Nov. 13.
Anthony Edwards had been held to 20 or fewer points in eight of the previous 14 games.
Pre-Game Insights: There are no pre-game insights mentioned in the article.
Post-Match Reflections: The Timberwolves fell short in a 119-105 loss to the Detroit Pistons after Anthony Edwards' dominant efforts to carry Minnesota's offense.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Edwards' previous career high was 51 points against Washington on April 9 last season.
The Timberwolves appeared to be heating up with three straight victories late last month, but have now lost three in a row to drop back to the.500 mark (17-17).
Others: The article mentions that the Timberwolves are looking to make it 4 straight victories when it hosts Memphis.
